mapper.select: select distinct(pub_premium_rule.citycode) as id, pub_cityaddr.city as text from pub_premium_rule,pub_cityaddr where pub_premium_rule.citycode = pub_cityaddr.id and pub_premium_rule.platformtype = 1

select distinct(pub_premium_rule_weekdetail.weekday) as id, (CASE when weekday = 1 then "星期一" when weekday = 2 then "星期二" when weekday = 3 then "星期三" when weekday = 4 then "星期四" when weekday = 5 then "星期五" when weekday = 6 then "星期六" else "星期日" end) as text from pub_premium_rule_weekdetail where pub_premium_rule_weekdetail.premiumruleid=#{id} ORDER BY pub_premium_rule_weekdetail.weekday
select * from pub_premium_rule where id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE pub_premium_rule SET rulestatus = 1,isoperated = 1 where id = #{id}
UPDATE pub_premium_rule SET rulestatus = 0,isoperated = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id from pub_cityaddr where city = #{cityName}

select count(*) from( SELECT id,premiumruleid, CONCAT(starttime,'-',endtime) as theTime,premiumrate,updatetime, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(startdate,'%Y/%m/%d'),'-',DATE_FORMAT(enddate,'%Y/%m/%d'))as weekday FROM pub_premium_rule_datedetail WHERE premiumruleid = #{id}
and STR_TO_DATE(pub_premium_rule_datedetail.startdate,'%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and STR_TO_DATE(pub_premium_rule_datedetail.enddate,'%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY starttime )t

select count(*) from pub_premium_rule where citycode = (select pub_cityaddr.id from pub_cityaddr where pub_cityaddr.city = #{cityname}) and cartype = #{cartype} and ruletype = #{ruletype} and pub_premium_rule.status = 1 and pub_premium_rule.leasescompanyid = #{leasescompanyid} and pub_premium_rule.platformtype = 1

select t.*,(@i:=@i+1) as code from( SELECT id, premiumruleid, IF(ruletype = '0','按星期','按日期') as ruletype, DATE_FORMAT(updatetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') updatetime, (select nickname from le_user where id = op.creater) as creater, (CASE when operationtype = 0 then '启用' when operationtype = 1 then '禁用' else '修改' end) operationtype FROM pub_premium_rule_operation op WHERE op.premiumruleid = #{id} AND op.`status` = 1 )t,(select @i:=0) a LIMIT ${iDisplayStart},${iDisplayLength}

select count(*) from( SELECT premiumruleid, IF(ruletype = '0','按星期','按日期') as ruletype, DATE_FORMAT(updatetime,'%Y-%m-%d'), creater, (CASE when operationtype = 0 then '启用' when operationtype = 1 then '禁用' else '修改' end) operationtype FROM pub_premium_rule_operation op WHERE op.premiumruleid = #{id} AND op.`status` = 1 )t
SELECT id,premiumruleid,weekday,startdt,enddt,premiumrate,updatetime,creater,updater FROM pub_premium_rule_weekdetail WHERE premiumruleid = #{id} ORDER BY pub_premium_rule_weekdetail.weekday, startdt

SELECT id,premiumruleid,starttime as startdt,endtime as enddt,premiumrate,updatetime,creater,updater, DATE_FORMAT(startdate,'%Y-%m-%d') startTime, DATE_FORMAT(enddate,'%Y-%m-%d') endTime FROM pub_premium_rule_datedetail WHERE premiumruleid = #{id} ORDER BY starttime

select pub_premium_rule.id,city as citycode,rulename,cartype,ruletype,DATE_FORMAT(pub_premium_rule.startdt,'%Y-%m-%d') as startdt, DATE_FORMAT(pub_premium_rule.enddt,'%Y-%m-%d') as enddt from pub_premium_rule,pub_cityaddr where pub_premium_rule.citycode = pub_cityaddr.id and pub_premium_rule.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `pub_premium_rule_weekdetail_history` (id,operationid,weekday,startdt,enddt,premiumrate,createtime,updatetime,creater,updater,status) VALUES ( uuid(), #{id}, #{weekday}, #{startdt}, #{enddt}, #{premiumrate}, now(), now(), #{creater}, #{updater}, 1 );

INSERT INTO `pub_premium_rule_datedetail_history` (id,operationid,startdate,enddate,starttime,endtime,premiumrate,createtime,updatetime,creater,updater,status) VALUES ( uuid(), #{id}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{startdt}, #{enddt}, #{premiumrate}, now(), now(), #{creater}, #{updater}, 1 );
